response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be far beyond what meets the eye. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored for individuals like yourself who appreciate quality and innovation. We believe this investment could pay dividends in the long run, helping you achieve your goals more efficiently and effectively. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
